attributes.action: Stop raising living costs an cut out council tax
attributes.additional_details: Costs of living seems to be rising but people's earnings doesn't seem to be changing.
attributes.background: Council tax is due to go up by 4.6% by next month! Where is all this money going, if theres been so many cut backs with the NHS, Education and police work. We need to stand together an refuse to pay this.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. Local councils are responsible for deciding the rate of council tax in their area. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors.
